title: Horse-flesh for the Observator being a comment upon Gusman, ch. 4, v. 5 held forth at Sam's Coffee-House / by T.D.B.D. chaplain to the Inferiour clergies guide.
author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.
notes: "'The minor clergy' ... is said to have thronged Sam's Coffee-House ... to listen to L'Estrange"--DNB.
A reply to accusations made against Miles Prance in Sir Roger L'Estrange's newspaper "The Observator." Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
